message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you see in the product, $120 is a bit too high for my budget.  I'm willing to pay $85 for it, but I can't go any higher.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105. It's a great compromise that still reflects the value I see in the product.

Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet me halfway, but $105 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $85.  This is my final offer, and if you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to go with another seller.

I understand that you're firm on your price, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $98. It's a fair price that still reflects the value I see in the product, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
